name: Opening up science, knowledge and getting paid to develop FLOSS
tagline: A presentation for a proposed main track talk at FOSDEM 2013. The talk didn't get accepted but the materials may be useful and needed to be published under an appropriate license.
body:

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
